Question: This person became a naturalized citizen of the United States on 12 May 2004, while retaining her Canadian citizenship.
Hints: In April 2006, this person hosted Canada's Juno Awards, becoming the first non-singer and model to do so.
This person filed for divorce from Lee twice and reconciled with him twice, before the couple finally divorced in 1998.
This person sued the video distribution company, Internet Entertainment Group.
